originalText.text:
I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for the incredible experience I had with your program. Participating in GO Broadway was a truly transformative journey for me, one that I will cherish for a lifetime.

I am amazed at how much I learned during my time with GO broadway. The comprehensive knowledge and deep understanding of musical theatre, dance, and the history of theatre that was imparted to us was truly remarkable. The passion and expertise of our teachers were highly inspiring, and they created a nurturing environment that fostered both learning and personal growth.

However, GO Broadway provided more than just knowledge. It provided an opportunity for us to connect with our peers and develop lifelong friendships. The camaraderie and support we experienced throughout the program were invaluable, creating a sense of belonging and unity among us.

As the program drew to a close, I realised that GO Broadway had instilled in me a newfound sense of confidence. The emphasis on hard work and dedication has taught me an irreplaceable lesson about the importance of perseverance and discipline in achieving success. I now appreciate musical Broadway in a whole new light, with a deep respect for the immense effort and talent required to bring a production to life.

Once again, I want to extend my sincere thanks to the entire GO Broadway team. Your commitment to excellence and the transformative power of the performing arts is truly commendable. I am eternally grateful for the experience and the lasting impact it has had on me.

text.text: Go was an amazing experience. I not only brought along colleagues but also friends from whom I learned a lot from each one. A place where you don't feel judged but accompanied, where we are all in the same place. It really was crazy and if you have the opportunity to do it I would tell you to do it because you will never forget it, it is one of those experiences that leave a mark on you and that will accompany you throughout your entire life. I can only thank Go Broadway for everything we experienced, and Nico and Connie for being the best guides and supporting us until the end, always with the best smile. Thank you!

THANK YOU for the dedication and support you gave our children so they could have this wonderful experience. In his words: "...the best trip."
The GO Broadway program, in addition to having classes with industry professionals, allows them to find themselves as artists, project their path and share the same passion with their peers, learning from each one of them. üôåüèª‚ù§
